4306130.name: Subway Story
4306130.description:
Subway Story is a narrative-driven exploration game set entirely within the New York City subway. It's a place where millions of lives briefly intersect daily, and nothing is ever quite what it seems.

You ride the train. You wander between cars and stations. You talk to strangers, take on small jobs, and stumble into moments that feel ordinary… until they don’t. Over time, the subway begins to change in unexpected ways.

You only have one life in the city with choices that matter and are remembered.

Key Features

  • Extensive Stations: Explore subway cars, platforms, and underground spaces inspired by real NYC locations.

  • Characters: Meet performers, vendors, commuters, and strangers with their own destinations and personality. Some offer help. Some ask for favors. Some want something else...

  • Choices: Make meaningful choices that influence opportunities, dialogue, and the way the world unfolds.

  • Episode-Based Structure: The story unfolds in episodes that flow naturally as you move throughout the subway network.

  • Rats

  • Chop-Cheese
4306130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
